document.full_text: if the sexual politics in the revival of the 1946 play 'born yesterday' still carry a whiff of the postwar years, the political resonance could scarcely be more potent.
document.title: theater review | 'born yesterday': daffy blonde gets wise to washington
lines_and_colors: if the sexual politics in the revival of the 1946 play 'born yesterday' still carry a whiff of the postwar years, the political resonance could scarcely be more potent.
